item.description:
Come out, meet the other members of the meetup and have fun answering questions about anything and everything. Even if you think you're no good at trivia, you'll probably know something the rest of us don't, join us!

The Trivia game starts at 9PM. I'll be there around 8:30 to find a table big enough for the group.



Have ideas for other events? Come and tell me about them!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with bicycle gear and a meetup sign.
item.why: Great conversation, fun people, a fun game, good music (usually), and an over the top trivia master (you really have to come at least once to understand)
item.name: Can't... Stop... Trivia @ Fatty McGees
